repliclust.random_centers.adjusted_log_packing¶

repliclust.random_centers.adjusted_log_packing(packing: float, dim: int)¶

Adjust the volume density of clusters within a bounded region for higher dimensions, based on the density in 2D.

packingfloat, >0

The volume density of clusters within a bounded region in 2D.

dimint, >= 2

The actual number of dimensions.

log_packingfloat, >0

The logarithm of the adjusted cluster density.

This function is based on Ball’s lower bound for the maximum density of a hard sphere packing in high dimensions.

repliclust
